specifications: Display: 2.7" TFT LCD screen Focal Distance: >150cm Resolution: Image: 8M(3264X2448), 5M(2592x1944), 3M(2048×1536), 2M(1600×1200), 1M(1024×768); Video: 1280X720, 720X480, 640X480, 320X240 Sensitivity: Automatic Memory: Support External SD Card, MMC Memory Card, MAX 32GB TV System: NTSC/PAL Battery: Work via 3*AAA Battery(not included) Temperature: Operate:0-40 Celsius degree, Storage: 20-60 Celsius degree Microphone: Built-in Speaker: Built-in Size: 118 x 55 x 55(mm) Weight: 190g(DV only)

mainfeatures: 2.7" TFT LCD color screen gives you and your families a wonderful life 8X zoom digital camera, easy to control and capture life's most captivating moments The 8.0MP LCD high definition camcorder has audio record, still photos and TV out function You can use this cheap digital video camcorder as PC camera LCD digital video camera uses li-ion battery The video camcorder comes with standard TV & High Definition TV output
